collection.name: Gran Espresso
collection.description: Light and flavorful blend with cocoa and black pepper for an intense experience.

collection.name: Planalto
collection.description: Brazilian dark roast with rich and velvety body, and hints of fruits and nuts.

collection.name: Piccollo
collection.description: Mild and smooth blend featuring notes of toasted almond and dried cherry.

collection.name: Danche
collection.description: Ethiopian hand-harvested blend densely packed with vibrant fruit notes.

info.name: Best quality
info.description: Discover an endless variety of the world’s best artisan coffee from each of our roasters.

info.name: Exclusive benefits
info.description: Special offers and swag when you subscribe, including 30% off your first shipment.

info.name: Free shipping
info.description: We cover the cost and coffee is delivered fast. Peak freshness: guaranteed.

howworks.name: Pick your coffee
howworks.description: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

howworks.name: Choose the frequency
howworks.description: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

howworks.name: Receive and enjoy!
howworks.description: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.

coffe.name: Capsule
coffe.description: Compatible with Nespresso systems and similar brewers

coffe.name: Filter
coffe.description: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60

coffe.name: Espresso
coffe.description: Dense and finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience

type.name: Single Origin
type.description: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm

type.name: Decaf
type.description: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed

type.name: Blended
type.description: Combination of two or three dark roasted beans of organic coffees

much.name: 250g
much.description: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

much.name: 500g
much.description: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

much.name: 1000g
much.description: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

grind.name: Wholebean
grind.description: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience

grind.name: Filter
grind.description: For drip or pour-over coffee methods such as V60 or Aeropress

grind.name: Cafetiére
grind.description: Course ground beans specially suited for french press coffee

often.name: Every week
often.description: $7.20 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

often.name: Every 2 weeks
often.description: $9.60 per shipment. Includes free priority shipping.

often.name: Every month
